title: 91/86/EEC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 4 February 1991 amending Decision 90/182/Euratom, EEC authorizing the United Kingdom not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 February 1991  amending Decision 90/182/Euratom, EEC authorizing the United Kingdom not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own  resources base  (Only the English text is authentic)  (91/86/EEC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
1. Article 1 of Decision 90/182/Euratom, EEC is hereby repealed with effect from 1 January 1990.
2. Article 2 (2) of Decision 90/182/Euratom, EEC is hereby repealed with effect from 1 August 1990.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 February 1991. For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 155, 7. 6. 1989, p. 9. (2) OJ No L 145, 13. 6. 1977, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 226, 3. 8. 1989, p. 21. (4) OJ No L 99, 19. 4. 1990, p. 33.
